review:
Movie is completely different and unique from other supernatural thrillers. It was an experience. Manoj Bajpayee and Amitabh Bachchan were  the true souls of this movie.
Such movies should be made in Indian cinema.

Had been hauntingly fascinated by the movie....some 15yrs back when I had first seen it,repeatedly.....Amitabh Bachchan was riveting to watch...Raveena Tandon....Nandita Das....the music n song picturisations.....Manoj Bajpai .in that order....the rest of the cast ..a great job....
underrated movie of Bollywood. Indian audiences were not matured enough to understand ths cult movie

I have never seen such a film like this
And the acting of manoj bajpaye is extra ordinary
This is 1 of best movie... who like SOMETHING  NEW STORY.....
All songs of aksh was  melodious
two legend keeps the movie up at all time... for acting and dialog ,,, 8/10
Beyond it's time because Reality is strange then fiction,hats off.
